inline/basic.title: Basic
inline/basic.description: To turn a code block into a live demo, add live after the language meta string.

inline/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
inline/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: There's two ways to add a live demo in MDX files. We call them inline and external demos.
